title: The First Monthly Symbolism Seminar | Pinocchio, Jordan Peterson and turning chaos against chaos
description:
I am posting clips from the first of a monthly interactive seminar on symbolism for patrons on Patreon.  The seminar lasts one hour and we engaged a series of questions and subjects from participants.  In this clip we deal with the symbolism of Pinocchio, the modifications done by Disney on fairy tales and we look at a description of how chaos can be used against chaos.

Logan video on Dtube
https://d.tube/#!/v/symbolism/3a2ei6x4

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan
